mapper.select: select pt.*, ut.*, case when day(ut.birthdate) = day(current_date()) then '오늘 생일 친구' else '일반 친구' end as is_birthday, max(ft.is_blocked) as is_blocked from user_tb ut inner join profile_tb pt on pt.user_id = ut.id inner join friend_tb ft on (ft.user_id1 = ut.id or ft.user_id2 = ut.id) where ut.id in ( select case when user_id1 = 1 then user_id2 else user_id1 end as 친구 from friend_tb where (user_id1 = 1 or user_id2 = 1)) group by ut.id having max(ft.is_blocked) = false
select ut.id, ut.nickname, pt.back_image, pt.profile_image, pt.status_message from user_tb as ut inner join profile_tb as pt on ut.profile_id = pt.id where ut.id = #{id}
select ut.Id, ut.nickname, pt.profile_image, pt.back_image, pt.status_message from user_tb as ut inner join profile_tb as pt on ut.profile_id = pt.id where ut.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into friend_tb(user_id1, user_id2, is_blocked) values (#{id}, (select id from user_tb where phone_num=#{phoneNum}), false)
insert into friend_tb(user_id1, user_id2, is_blocked) values (#{id}, (select id from user_tb where email=#{email}), false)
mapper.select: select ft.user_id1, ft.user_id2, ut.phoneNum from user_tb as ut join friend_tb as ft on ft.user_id2 = ut.id where ft.user_id1=#{id} and ut.phone_num=#{phoneNum}
select ft.user_id1, ft.user_id2, ut.email from user_tb as ut join friend_tb as ft on ft.user_id2 = ut.id where ft.user_id1=#{id} and ut.email=#{email}
mapper.update: update friend_tb set is_blocked=true where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from friend_tb where is_blocked = false;
